title: Not in the club as a club owner
body: So basicly I'm not in my club since the client change and my friends still see me as an owner. Is there a way to fix this ?

replies.body: Hit me back up with the name of that club and I can get that fixed up for ya!
Sure thing, club name is #TILT, sorry for the late response but I've just come back home. Thanks in advance!
Same for you ^_^! Let me know what the name of the club is and I can get that fixed for you as well.
hay, having the same problem... Club tag is EryCa and Clubname is EnergyCarries
You should be good as well!
